result.title: Week #13
result.content:
Hello everyone,

Today, we solved problem E from GPC2018. Here is the solution: https://ideone.com/4D7bBt

We also talked about SQRT-Decomposition and solved the Range-Minimum Query problem, with updates. Here is the code: https://ideone.com/3Z5Bg0

In contest #13, you will find three problems that will help you understand SQRT-Decomposition and its complexity, and another three problems to solve as applications of SQRT-Decomposition.

Good luck!
